General.Name: Zhejiang Guangsha Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Dongwang Times Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of energy-saving services, and film and television culture solutions in China. It is involved in the energy-saving design, operation, and management of hot water supply systems; and provision of hot water energy-saving supply services for colleges and universities. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Guangsha Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Dongwang Times Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2021. Zhejiang Dongwang Times Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Dongyang, China.
General.Address: West side of No. 1 Zhenxing Road, Dongyang, China

AddressData.Street: West side of No. 1 Zhenxing Road
